import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link, BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, withRouter, HashRouter, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' class ExplFormationNiv extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { filiere: '', specialite: '', nomFormation: '', nivBase: '', niveaux: [] } } componentDidMount() { let idFormation = this.props.location.state.idFormation; axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL + 'Back_mediatraining/GetFormationById.php?id=' + idFormation).then(res => { this.setState({ filiere: res.data[0].filiere.label, specialite: res.data[0].specialite.label, nomFormation: res.data[0].nomFormation, nivBase: res.data[0].nivBase.label, niveaux: res.data[1] }) }) } render() { return (

Informations Formation

{/* /.col-lg-12 */}
{/* /.row */}
{this.state.niveaux.map(el => )}
Niveau Durée
{el.niveau} {el.duree}
); } } export default ExplFormationNiv;
